name: ASTEROIDS - RETRO 1979
description:
Asteroids is a simple and fun based on physics game that was very popular on the Atari 2600 console. 

You're the pilot of the Ship that has to explore the vast Universe !!

FEATURES:

  • Single player
  • 5 levels to complete before time is over
  • Great variety of asteroids

There might be some undetected bugs, please report them
